title: Hour 2: Super Serena
description:
Stephen A, James Blake, Paul Finebaum and former head coach Bruce Arians appear in the second hour. Should the Bucs be concerned about Brady? Will Ohio St. clobber Notre Dame? Can Serena win the US Open?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: How many matches can Serena win at the US Open?
